feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over higher terrain in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over higher terrain in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
